name: Factions (Frenchie14)
description:
This open source game was made from scratch in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38! You can read more details here!

Instructions:

  • Capture all bases in the world to win
  • Be the only player near a base to capture it
  • Bases spawn pawns
  • Left click + drag over pawns to select them. Then left click to send them
  • WASD / Arrow keys to move the camera
